root.sql: SELECT a.table_name AS TABLE_NAME, pg_catalog.obj_description(b.oid) AS COMMENTS FROM information_schema.tables a JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class b ON a.table_name = b.relname WHERE a.table_schema = '{{owner}}' AND b.relkind = 'r' {{#tableName}} AND (a.table_name = '{{tableName}}' OR pg_catalog.obj_description(b.oid) LIKE '%' || '{{tableName}}' || '%') {{/tableName}}

SELECT a.table_name AS TABLE_NAME, c.column_name AS COLUMN_NAME, pg_catalog.col_description(b.oid, c.ordinal_position) AS COMMENTS, c.data_type AS DATA_TYPE, COALESCE(c.character_maximum_length, c.numeric_precision) AS DATA_LENGTH FROM information_schema.tables a JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class b ON a.table_name = b.relname JOIN information_schema.columns c ON a.table_name = c.table_name WHERE a.table_schema = '{{owner}}' AND b.relkind = 'r' {{#tableName}} AND (a.table_name = '{{tableName}}' OR pg_catalog.obj_description(b.oid) LIKE '%' || '{{tableName}}' || '%') {{/tableName}} {{#columnName}} AND (c.column_name = '{{columnName}}' OR pg_catalog.col_description(b.oid, c.ordinal_position) LIKE '%' || '{{columnName}}' || '%') {{/columnName}} ORDER BY a.table_name, c.ordinal_position ASC

SELECT d.attname FROM information_schema.tables a JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class b ON a.table_name = b.relname JOIN pg_catalog.pg_index c ON b.oid = c.indrelid JOIN pg_catalog.pg_attribute d ON c.indexrelid = d.attrelid WHERE a.table_schema = '{{owner}}' AND b.relname = '{{tableName}}'
